input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Valid Values: BMC_AR_System, BMC_Atrium, HP_ServiceCenter
An XML document containing one or more configuration items

output.description: An XML document containing configuration items
An XML document containing input of failed configuration items
String Value - Count of successful configuration items
String Value - Count of failed configuration items

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: success, failure.
String Value - A process specific explanation for the value of success status.

call-process.process-name: :AutoPilot-OA-Configuration_Management:Utilities:Translate Field Values to Enumerated Values for Single Configuration Item

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Unable to create configuration record for: ", "${ci name}")

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${existing dataset id}') > '0'">${existing dataset id}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <class-type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${class type}</xsl:text> </class-type> <item> <parameters> <username /> <password /> <login-info> <user-id>${user id}</user-id> <password>${password}</password> <lang>${login language}</lang> </login-info> <class-name-id> <namespace-name>${namespace name}</namespace-name> <class-name>${class name}</class-name> </class-name-id> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> <role1Name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${role1 name}</xsl:text> </role1Name> <instance1Id> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${instance1 id}</xsl:text> </instance1Id> <class1Id> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${class1 id}</xsl:text> </class1Id> <role2Name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${role2 name}</xsl:text> </role2Name> <instance2Id> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${instance2 id}</xsl:text> </instance2Id> <class2Id> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${class2 id}</xsl:text> </class2Id> <a-dataset-id>${dataset id}</a-dataset-id> </parameters> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${existing dataset id}') > '0'">${existing dataset id}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <parameters> <username>${user id}</username> <password> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${password}')=0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${password}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </password> <login-info> <locale /> <time-zone /> <authentication /> </login-info> <dataset-id>${dataset id}</dataset-id> <instance-info> <class-name-id> <namespace-name>${namespace name}</namespace-name> <class-name>${class name}</class-name> </class-name-id> <attributes> <xsl:for-each select="//attributes/items"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="value/diary-value!=''"> <list> <name> <xsl:value-of select="name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </name> <value> <diary-value> <diary-value-in> <xsl:value-of select="//diary-value" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </diary-value-in> </diary-value> </value> </list> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <list> <xsl:copy-of select="child::node()" /> </list> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:for-each> </attributes> </instance-info> </parameters> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${existing dataset id}') > '0'">${existing dataset id}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <class-type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${class type}</xsl:text> </class-type> <item> <parameters> <username /> <password /> <login-info> <user-id>${user id}</user-id> <password>${password}</password> <lang>${login language}</lang> </login-info> <class-name-id> <namespace-name>${namespace name}</namespace-name> <class-name>${class name}</class-name> </class-name-id> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> <a-dataset-id>${dataset id}</a-dataset-id> </parameters> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Unable to create configuration record for: ", "${ci name}")

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="//item/metadata/status" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string-length(//instance/contact-name/value/text())!='0'"> <xsl:value-of select="//instance/contact-name/value/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length(//instance/device/configuration-item/value/text())!='0'"> <xsl:value-of select="//instance/device/configuration-item/value/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Unable to create the following Configuration Item: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Configuration-Items> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> ${failed configuration item} </Configuration-Items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Configuration-Items> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> ${configuration item} </Configuration-Items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This workflow will create a configuration item.
